homePage.heroText: Ndewo, abụ m onye nrụpụta n'ihu, onye nrụpụta akara na onye ndezi foto na Jos, Nigeria. Na-achọsi ike ịgbasa ihe ọmụma na nka

aboutPage.brief: Abụ m Victor Umeokoli ma ọ bụ Umeh maka ibi mkpirisi na Jos, plateau state Nigeria
aboutPage.skills: Abụ m onye nrụpụta frontend, logo & vector onye nrụpụta ihe na-achọ blockchain nwere ahụmịhe afọ 3 dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ foto.
aboutPage.hobbyDesc: Ọ na-amasị m ịga njem, ịgụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo na ihe ọchị na-amụta ihe ọhụrụ na-adọrọ mmasị m ma ọ bụ nke bụ maka ọrụ. N'oge ntụrụndụ m, m na-ekiri bọl ma ọ bụ anime.
aboutPage.skillsList: Nkà nka na ngwa ọrụ m na-arụ ọrụ bụ HTML, CSS, tailwindcss, SASS, ihe ndị e ji eme ihe, git, Javascript, Typescript, Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom na ndị ọzọ ......

objective.body: Onye nrụpụta frontend raara onwe ya nye, na-emepụta ngwa weebụ na-etinye aka, na-emekọrịta ihe na nke na-emetụta onye ọrụ. Nwee obi ụtọ ịsụgharị atụmatụ UI/UX ka ọ bụrụ ihu na-arụ ọrụ yana nke na-anabata ya ka ị na-eji usoro mmepe weebụ kachasị ọhụrụ na teknụzụ. Na-achọ ọrụ mmepe frontend dị obere na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ na-eche n'ihu.

section1.role: Onye nchịkọta akụkọ foto na ngwa nbipute
section1.text: Ụlọ ọrụ na-ebi akwụkwọ foto na-enye ọrụ dijitalụ, foto na ọrụ mbipụta maka ndị na-ese foto na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na jos, Plateau steeti Nigeria. Junị 2018 - Disemba 2020

section2.text: Jenụwarị 2021 - Febụwarị 2022 Ụlọ ọrụ fotograghy ​​na ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta foto na-enye dijitalụ, ịse foto, ntinye foto na ọrụ mbipụta maka ndị na-ese foto na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na jos, Plateau steeti Nigeria.

details.1: Trinity Model Secondary School - Anambra - Jan 2012 - Dec 2013
details.2: St Stephen Secondary School - Anambra - Jan 2014 - Dec 2015
details.3: New Dominion Comprehensive School - Plateau - Jun 2015 - Dec 2017

skills: Nkà mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

toolsPage.header: Ndị a bụ ụfọdụ ngwaọrụ m na-eji, maka imepụta, na-ebuli ihe onyonyo na mmepe. Ana m emeghe mgbe niile ịmụta teknụzụ ọhụrụ achọrọ maka ọrụ ahụ.

frontend.name: HTML
frontend.description: HTML bụ isi nkuku m dị ka onye nrụpụta frontend. Site na ya, m na-emepụta ahụmịhe weebụ na-adọrọ adọrọ, na-ahazi ọdịnaya yana hụ na enwere ike ịnweta ya. Ọ bụ akwaaji m maka nka dijitalụ.

frontend.name: Css
frontend.description: CSS!!, enyi m imewe, na-enye m ike njem n'ihu m. Dị ka onye mmepụta ihe na-eto eto, m na-eji anwansi ya mee ka ndụ dị ndụ na HTML, na-emepụta ebe nrụọrụ weebụ mara mma. Ọ bụ akwa akwa m na-emepụta, nhazi nhazi, ụdị, na n'ịhụ nzaghachi. Site na CSS , M na-agbanwe koodu ka ọ bụrụ ahụmịhe onye ọrụ na-adọrọ adọrọ, otu pikselụ n'otu oge.

frontend.name: SASS
frontend.description: Sass, modularizes CSS ma ọ bụ opekata mpe otu ahụ ka m si ahụ ya. Dịka onye nrụpụta frontend, m na-eji Sass na-emegharị CSS, na-eme ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma ma na-echekwa ya. Ọ bụ ngwa m maka akwụ akwụ, mgbanwe na mixins. Site na Sass, m na-edepụta amamihe karịa na ụdị obi ike.

frontend.name: Tailwindcss
frontend.description: Tailwind CSS, onye mmekọ m na-arụpụta ihe, na-agbanwe ọrụ n'ihu. Dịka onye nrụpụta na-eto eto, m na-adabere na ike Tailwind-mbụ ụzọ mbụ maka prototyping ngwa ngwa na koodu dị ọcha. Ọ na-eme ka nhazi dị mfe ma na-abawanye arụmọrụ, na-enye m ohere ịmepụta weebụsaịtị n'ụzọ dị mfe. Nhọrọ kacha amasị m maka ịke.

frontend.name: Styled Components
frontend.description: Ewubere saịtị a site na iji akụrụngwa nwere ụdị. Dịka onye nrụpụta nke obere, ana m anabata ike ya ịkepụta ihe mejupụtara React nwere akara ederede ederede. Ọ bụ ụzọ m ga-esi nweta ụdị agbachitere, mweghachi, yana koodu ntọala ahaziri ahazi.

frontend.name: MUI
frontend.description: Material-UI (MUI), ihe ngwa ngwa imewe m, na-ebuli ike ihu m. Dịka onye nrụpụta na-eto eto, m na-ejikọ ihe ndị MUI na isiokwu maka ngwa mmeghachi omume na-adọrọ adọrọ ma na-atọ ụtọ. Ọ na-eme ka mmepe UI dị mfe, na-eme ka nkwụsi ike, ma na-enye m ike ịmepụta ihu ndị ọrụ mara mma n'enweghị mgbalị ọ bụla. Ihe-UI: ebe ọrụ na-ezute ịma mma na imewe weebụ.

frontend.name: Javascript
frontend.description: Javascript, ihe ịma aka mmụta m, na-eme ka ọchịchọ m dị n'ihu. Dịka onye nrụpụta obere, ana m agba mbọ na mgbagwoju anya ya iji mepụta ahụmịhe webụ mmekọrịta. Ọ bụ asụsụ edemede m maka njikwa DOM, na-agbakwunye ọrụ, yana melite mmekọrịta ndị ọrụ. Site na ndidi na omume, m na-eto eto ka ọ bụrụ onye nwere ntụkwasị obi na onye nwere ikike n'ime ụwa Javascript.

frontend.name: Typescript
frontend.description: TypeScript, onye ndụmọdụ nzuzo m, na-eduzi njem m n'ihu. Dịka onye nrụpụta obere, ana m anabata mpịnye ya siri ike yana nyocha ya static iji dee Javascript dị nchebe yana nke enwere ike idobe ya. Ọ bụ ọta m megide njehie oge ọ na-agba ọsọ, na-enyere m aka iwulite ngwa siri ike ma nwee ike ịgbatị. TypeScript bụ àkwà mmiri m iji ghọ onye nwere obi ike na nke ọma.

frontend.name: React
frontend.description: React.js, ihe ngosi mmepe m, na-eme ka ebumnuche m dị n'ihu. Dịka onye nrụpụta obere, m na-eji ihe owuwu dabere na akụrụngwa React iji rụọ ọrụ mmekọrịta yana ndị na-anabata ndị ọrụ. Ọ bụ ngwa ọrụ m maka iwulite ngwa weebụ dị ike, na-eme ka njikwa steeti dị mfe, yana ịkwalite arụmọrụ UI. Site na React.js, mmepe frontend na-aghọ nkọ.

workflow.name: Figma
workflow.description: Figma, àkwà mmiri m na-emepụta-na-koodu, na-agbanwe njem m n'ihu. Dị ka njirimara mmekọ figma onye nrụpụta na-enyere m aka ịtụgharị uche n'ọhụụ ndị nrụpụta ka ọ bụrụ koodu. Ọ bụ akwaaji m maka inyocha nhazi nhazi, mbupụ akụ, yana hụ na mmejuputa pikselụ zuru oke. Site na Figma, ana m ejikọta ọdịiche nke onye nrụpụta na nkenke na arụmọrụ.

workflow.name: Adobe xd
workflow.description: Adobe XD, ihe na-eme ka imewe-to-code m, na-agbanwe mmekorita m n'ihu. Agbanyeghị na abụghị onye nrụpụta, ana m eji XD kewapụta atụmatụ wee tụgharịa ha ka ọ bụrụ koodu arụ ọrụ. Ọ na-akwalite ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, na-emezigharị aka aka, ma hụkwa na iguzosi ike n'ihe chepụta na usoro mmepe. Adobe XD: na-ejikọta imewe na koodu n'enweghị nsogbu maka usoro ọrụ kwekọrọ.

workflow.name: Photoshop
workflow.description: Photoshop, kwaaji dijitalụ m, na-enye ike okike m ike. Site na ya, m na-arụzi foto n'enweghị nsogbu ọ bụla, kọlụm ọrụ nka, na megharịa onyonyo ka ọ zuo oke. Ọ bụ igbe ọrụ m maka ịgbanwe echiche ka ọ bụrụ ọmarịcha ihe ngosi, na-ewepụta ikike nka m. Photoshop: ebe echiche na-ezute nkenke, na-enyere m aka iweta ọhụụ na ndụ.

workflow.name: Illustrator
workflow.description: Adobe Illustrator, ogige egwuregwu okike m, na-eme ka mmasị m nwere maka imepụta akara na eserese eserese. Ọ bụ ngwá ọrụ kacha mma maka iji nkenke nkenke wee were ahịrị na agba na-akọwapụta mkpụrụedemede dị mgbagwoju anya iji mepụta akara ngosi dị mgbagwoju anya. Onye na-ese ihe bụ ebe ọhụụ nka nka na-eto eto, na-atụgharị echiche ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi akara ngosi.

workflow.name: Git
workflow.description: Git, maestro njikwa ụdị m, na-akpụzi njem koodu m. Dịka onye nrụpụta, ana m anabata ike Git iji soro mgbanwe, imekọ ihe ọnụ, ma jikwaa ikwado koodu. Ọ bụ ihe nchekwa m megide ọgbaghara, na-ahụ nkwụsi ike nke oru ngo yana na-eme ka otu nkwekọ n'ime ụwa nke nzuzo. Git: ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme koodu na-ezute mmekorita, na-eme ka mmepe ngwanrọ bụrụ ikuku.

workflow.name: Github
workflow.description: GitHub, oghere ime obodo m, na-akwalite mbọ mmepe m. Dịka onye nrụpụta, ana m eji GitHub kwado, imekọ ọnụ na kesaa koodu n'etiti obodo zuru ụwa ọnụ. Ọ bụ ikpo okwu m maka ntinye aka mepere emepe, ngosi ọrụ, na ịkwalite mmekọ. GitHub: ebe koodu na-ezute mmekorita, na-ebuli njem nzuzo m.

workflow.name: Lightroom
workflow.description: Lightroom, ebe nchekwa foto m, na-agbanwe onyonyo m ka ọ bụrụ ọmarịcha ihe ngosi. Ma m na-edezi, na-akwalite ma ọ bụ na-ahazi, ọ bụ ngwa ọrụ m maka iweta foto na ndụ. Ihe njiri mara nke Lightroom na presets na-eme ka usoro ahụ dị mfe, na-enye m ohere imeghe ikike ịse foto m n'enweghị mgbagha.

formModal.text: Ị chọrọ ịmalite ọrụ. Nye m oku +2348087411750, ọ ga-amasị m ịnụ gị.
